title: House with Land For Sale In Colombo - 08
details:
Good Residential or Commercial Property in Colombo – 08 (Kuruppu Road)

It’s Land facing a 20 feet road
70 feet road frontage

150 metrs to Main road (Cotta Road)
1 km to Borella Junction (Base line Rd)

Close to Super market, Banks, hospitals, Schools (British school, Devi Balika, D.S.S. Collage)

50 years old solid house consisting 4 Bed Rooms and 3 Bath Rooms, Dining room, Living area, 4 Car Parking

Value is for the land only

Land extent – 24 perches
Total Price Rs 144 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information
